Player History
Drafted in 5th round, 74th overall pick, by Brooklyn in 2015...
Earned first career win on 5/3/2015...
Was selected to the 2015 Allstar game...
10/22/2015: Signed a contract extension with Brooklyn, $15,000,000 per year, for 3 years.
Had first career hit on 4/10/2016, off Brian Whittingham (KC)...
Injured on 7/16/2016 with a Pulled Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Traded from Brooklyn to Houston on 5/1/2018 (Going to HOU: P Alex Gutierrez. Going to BRO: 1B Robert Weitzman, P Richard Thomas)...
Won World Series with Houston in 2018...
Signed as a free agent by Houston on 2/4/2019 to a 5-year deal worth $13,780,000 per year...
Injured on 9/26/2019 with a Ruptured Elbow Ligament, out for 3-4 weeks...
Injured on 9/2/2020 with a Torn Tricep Muscle, out for full season...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 7/1/2023, going 1-0, 0.47...
Signed as a free agent by Colorado on 2/4/2024 to a 1-year deal worth $20,000,000 per year...
